General.Name: Truking Technology Ltd
General.Description: Truking Technology Limited engages in medical equipment business in China and internationally. It is involved in pharmaceutical water business, that includes pharmaceutical water preparation, storage and distribution system, process tank group, public works, etc.; biological engineering, such as biological reaction system, liquid preparation system, separation and purification system, filtration system, disposable reaction system, biological related consumables, etc.; sterile preparations, that includes aseptic dispensing system, powder dispensing system, freeze dryer feeding and discharging system, pre-filling system, isolation system, special dispensing system, etc.; and solid preparations, such as fluidization, granulation, tablet compression, coating, capsules, aluminum-plastic packaging, etc. The company also engages in post-inspection packaging business, that includes light inspection, detection system, post-package system, logistics and warehousing system, etc.; Chinese medicine preparations, such as Chinese medicine extraction, concentration, drying, purification and separation, reaction, crystallization, etc.; AI and informatization systems, etc.; EPCMV services, that includes design and consulting, information construction, verification services, etc.; and cell and gene therapy, such as fully automatic intelligent cell culture equipment and process consumables, etc. Truking Technology Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.

4.Name: Mr. Fei Yue  Zhou
4.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
